name: Inner Demons (Shirynia)
description:
Inner Demons abstractly represents the confrontation and overcoming of inner conflicts. Boss fights of varying difficulty await the player on the individual levels.

The opponents embody everyday challenges, fears and self-doubt, which can be overcome with the help of strategic decisions, as well as various tools and abilities.

The goal is to face your personal weaknesses, defeat them or even accept them and grow from them.

Our demo illustrates the basic features and aesthetics of the planned game.
The project was born from a student collaboration of five people.

Thank you for your interest and have fun playing!
